message: Let's share who we want to see on TWiST
Has Jason Fried been a guest yet?
I would ;) I post a lot of startup news at http://profile.to/creativecommunications and http://groups.to/startuptwincities
@soska did you mean Andrew Warner? +1 from me if you did
@soska otherwise if you mean the CIA guy -1 from me

Adam Carolla would be a great guest for Jason, they could discuss the future of podcasting. He mentioned on his show that he turned down a multi-year 7-figure guarantee to do a radio show in order to focus on his podcast network
Wired wrote about Bloom saying that "it turns a data set - in this case music - into "tactile and dynamic visual objects."
Bloom co-founder Ben Cerveny would be awesome! RWW wrote in depth about bloom here http://ow.ly/4WiMT
Bloom's thought provking UI for http://planetary.bloom.io/ is incredible. If you click through, notice how Planetary instead of having an intro video, has a trailer :)
brain and mobile linkup technology guru, someone who is doing direct brainwave control of devices.
I love Bloom! My wife is a yoga teacher and is thinking of using it in her classes.
I really liked the dynamics around the Andrew Warner and James Altucher news roundup episode. Would like to see that lineup some more.
there is no friend online now

Take a look at HubSpot/Brian Halligan www.hubspot.com, and Charles Green, Trusted Advisor (http://trustedadvisor.com)  I found Hubspot through Green, who had helped the company with their marketing strategy.
